mention.text: the Bosnian Federation of Muslims and Croats
the governing party , which has run Croatia since independence in 1991
Dijana Plestina , a professor of political science
Mr. Tudjman , who died on Dec. 11
Mr. Tudjman , whose beaming face as he hugs a child is featured on its billboards
this part of Europe , where there has been so much human suffering and destruction
beaming face as he hugs a child
